definition: of or denoting or of the nature of or containing a base, (usually plural) a necessary commodity for which demand is constant
details:
adjective
- of or denoting or of the nature of or containing a base
- serving as a base or starting point
= example: serving as a base or starting point
= synonyms: introductory
- pertaining to or constituting a base or basis
= example: pertaining to or constituting a base or basis
- reduced to the simplest and most significant form possible without loss of generality
= example: reduced to the simplest and most significant form possible without loss of generality
= synonyms: canonical, canonic
noun
- (usually plural) a necessary commodity for which demand is constant
= synonyms: staple
